alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 22 at 7:08PM MST until September 22 at 11:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Central La Paz County in west central Arizona... * Until 1115 PM MST. * At 708 PM MST, La Paz County Sheriff`s Office reported flash flooding along Highway 95 north of Quartzsite requiring road closure. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Quartzsite. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 95 between mile markers 111 and 119. AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 21 and 24. This includes the following streams and drainages... Tyson Wash, Scaddan Wash, Plomosa Wash, Smith Wash, Poormans Wash and La Cholla Wash. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
